|stockos = Linux;2.6.31; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.85 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Proware |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/13/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833704049 |asin = B00NCLL1TI |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1208101901-3.0" and "Rev:1.0sp3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device would appear to be using a [[Atheros]] AR9341 WiSoC. :The RAM chip appears to be a ''Winbond'' W9425G6JH-5. ===Hardware versions=== 
Version	   CPU		Ram	Flash	Wireless   LAN

V1	AR7240 400MHz	32MiB	4MiB	AR9285
V2	AR9132 400MHz	32MiB	4MiB	AR9103	  Realtek RTL8201
V3	AR9341 533MHz	32MiB	4MiB	AR5416*
V4	AR9343 750MHz	32MiB	4MiB	AR9380*	  QCA TP9343*

* - internal WiSoC
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wa901nd ''TP-LINK TL-WA901ND'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([https://wiki.openwrt.org/_media/media/tplink/tl-wa901/tl-wa901nd-v3-inside.jpg PCB image]) :"2053500045" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the v3.0 board. *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=46990 ''TP-LINK TL-WA901ND v3'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = tl-wa901ndv3 build 28069 20151101 Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wa901nd_v3 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wa901nd |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=46990 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
